page.title: 18SCHOOL EVENTS_1984_1985
page.content: {15th October.}The boys won the Walter Stubbs Trophy at the Swimming Gala. {11th January 1985.}School choir performed at St.Christophers High School with instrumentalists. {11th.May}Boys came 2nd.in the Cross_Country Race at Wilsons Playing Fields.One of the girls was 2nd. {17th May}The School Choir competed at Blackburn Masic Festival and came 3rd. {5th.June.}The School Quiz Team lost in the final of yhe Library Quiz. {15th June.}A group of pupils represented the school at Hyndburn Schools Swimming Gala. {19th June.}Pupils from the juniors represented the school at Hyndburn School Sports at Sandy Lane.They were joint winners. {22nd June.} 5_a_side football comp. at Altham_A team winners.
